
================
SetupAstroMasses
================

.. currentmodule:: nucleardatapy.setupastromasses

.. Don't include inherited members to keep the doc short
.. automodule:: nucleardatapy.setup_astro_masses
	:members:

Here is a figure which is produced with the Python sample: /sample/nucleardatapy_plots/plot_setupAstroMasses.py

.. figure:: ../../../samples/nucleardatapy_plots/figs/plot_SetupAstroMasses.png
	:scale: 70 %
	:alt: map to buried treasure

	The masses measured for massive neutron stars is radio-astronomy. The different colors correspond to the different sources.
